item.title: This week we’re selling burritos & champurrado. Ingrid...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

This week we’re selling burritos & champurrado. Ingrid & Gaby are making burritos together to raise money for the emergency fund. It’s a little bit of money that we’re able to tap if anyone is unexpectedly detained or in need of immediate legal representation. The fund provides some peace of mind for everyone, because if something were to happen, there’s money to fall back on. You can support by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: We are asking you to join us in this last effort to save Tien...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

We are asking you to join us in this last effort to save Tien Pham from being deported to Vietnam. Tien is being held at a staging center used by ICE in Arizona. We hope to get a large number of calls made to the ICE Detention Center in Aurora Colorado from where his case is being managed.
Please also share widely! Here's information for the call.
Call ICE: 720-873-2899 then 1
Tien Pham
Hi, my name is ____ and I represent ____ (organization, or city/county where you live).... I am calling in strong support of Tien Pham #74515548 who is in transit, while his case continues to be managed from your office. Tien Pham is a refugee from Vietnam.,who spent years in a refugee camp and resettled into San Jose, CA after fleeing his war-torn country. After working hard to be found suitable for parole, Tien was transferred your facility. We’re asking for his deportation order to be reversed and he be allowed to join his family who welcome his return.

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

This week we’re selling burritos & champurrado. Ingrid & Gaby are making burritos together to raise money for the emergency fund. It’s a little bit of money that we’re able to tap if anyone is unexpectedly detained or in need of immediate legal representation. The fund provides some peace of mind for everyone, because if something were to happen, there’s money to fall back on. You can support by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

Border agency reports spike of nearly 6,000 immigrant children crossing into US alone

Yesterday, February 17th, Democrats in the House made a series of changes to the Biden administration’s immigration bill set to be introduced today at noon. These changes are unacceptable, and were made because some Democrats argued that this bill is too progressive because it would finally includ...

item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado“Biden is going to be dealing with a minority in Congress if he continues down some of these paths,” said one Democratic congressman.

politico.com

‘Recipe for disaster’: Dem fears mount over immigration overhaul

item.title: Lupe is making tres leches cake this weekend! Here are a few...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Lupe is making tres leches cake this weekend! Here are a few photos of cakes she’s made in the past. Tres leches cake saves well since it’s so moist—don’t be afraid to order even if you'll be enjoying it solo. It also freezes beautifully. Orders are open at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

item.title: Lupe is selling dulce de leche cake & gorditas this weekend!...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Lupe is selling dulce de leche cake & gorditas this weekend! You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Share with friends—the dulce de leche cake is worth it.

item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Lupe is selling gorditas next weekend! They’re gluten-free, and we’re able to accommodate other dietary restrictions upon request. Orders are open at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

item.title: Freedom
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Freedom

Saheeda Nadeem, 65, an undocumented immigrant from Pakistan who was given sanctuary by First Congregational Church in Kalamazoo, Mich., learned this week that she would not be deported, her lawyer said.

nytimes.com

After Three Years in a Church Facing Deportation, ‘Today I Have Freedom’

Saheeda Nadeem, 65, an undocumented immigrant from Pakistan who was given sanctuary by First Congregational Church in Kalamazoo, Mich., learned this week that she would not be deported, her lawyer said.Saheeda Nadeem, 65, an undocumented immigrant from Pakistan who was given sanctuary by First Congregational Church in Kalamazoo, Mich., learned this week that she would not be deported, her lawyer said.
